divs: Sighting DetailsIt looked just like a large star traveling very fast and leaving no sound whatsoever. It seemed to be traveling east. There were no blinking lights and nothing to show it was an airplane or blimp. It was moving way too fast.
Summary: A single bright white light no sound at all
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Tupelo
There were no other sightings in Tupelo on or around June 13th 2011
